article.headline: VMI 62, New Orleans 49
article.story: WESTWEGO, La. (AP) -- Bo McCalebb scored 16 points to lead the Univeristy of New Orleans to a 62-49 victory over VMI on Tuesday night. New Orleans (4-7) broke open a 30-30 halftime tie by holding VMI (5-3) to only 19 points on 8-of-23 shooting in the second half. Todd Bostic added 12 points and Chad Barnes 10 for New Orleans, which outshot VMI 50 percent to 34.8 percent in the second half. Matt Coward scored 20 for VMI, while Tim Allmond added 10 points. VMI was 0-for-8 on 3-pointers. New Orleans went 5-for-11 from long range. <

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
